Translations.Text: Ho, mim
Savgand ʙa in kitoʙi ravsangar
Mo in kitoʙro Qur'one araʙi qaror dodem, ʙosad, ki ʙa aql darjoʙed
Va on dar ummulkitoʙ ast dar nazdi Mo: kitoʙe arcmandu hikmatomez
Ojo ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki mardume az had guzasta hasted, az sumo ruj gardonem va Qur'onro az sumo dareƣ dorem
Ba mijoni pesinijon pajomʙaroni ʙisjore firistodem
Va hec pajomʙare ʙar onho firistoda namesud, ki masxaraas nakarda ʙosand
Onhoro, ki az onho ʙoquvvattar ʙudand, halok kardem. Va dostoni pesinijon guzast
Agar az onho ʙipursi: «Ci kase osmonhovu zaminro ofaridaast?» Megujand: «Onhoro on ƣoliʙi dono ofaridaast!»
On ki zaminro ʙisoti sumo soxt va ʙarojaton rohho dar on padid ovard, ʙosad, ki hidojat saved
Va on ki az osmon oʙ firistod ʙa miqdor. Va ʙa on sarzamini murdaro zinda kardem. Sumo niz incunin az gurho ʙerun ovarda saved
va on ki hamai cufthoro ʙijofarid. Va ʙarojaton az kistiho va corpojon markaʙho soxt, ki savor saved
Va cun ʙar pusti onho qaror girifted, ne'mati Parvardigoratonro jod kuned va ʙigued: «Pok ast on kas, ki inhoro romi mo kard, vagarna moro tavoni on naʙud
Va mo ʙa sui Parvardigoramon ʙozmegardem»
Va ʙaron U az mijoni ʙandagonas farzande qoil sudand. Odami ʙa oskoro nosipos (nosukr) ast
Ojo U az mijoni maxluqonas ʙaroi Xud duxtaron ʙargirifta va pisaronro xosi sumo kardaast
Va cun ʙa jake az onho muƶdai tavalludi hamon cizero dihand, ki ʙa Xudoi rahmon nisʙat doda, rujas sijoh gardad va pur az xasm savad
Ojo on ki ʙa orois parvaris jofta (ja'ne duxtar) va dar hangomi cidol oskor namegardad, az oni Xudost
Va faristagonro, ki ʙandagoni Xudojand, zan pindostand. Ojo ʙa hangomi ofarinisason on co hozir ʙudaand? Ba zudi in sohidiasonro menavisand va az onho ʙozxost mesavad
Guftand: «Agar Xudoi rahmon mexost, mo faristagonro nameparastidem». On ci megujand, az rui nodonist va ƣajri ʙa duruƣ suxan namegujand
Ojo pes az Qur'on kitoʙe ʙarojason nozil kardaem, ki aknun ʙa on cang mezanand? (pajravi mekunand)
Na, megujand: «Padaronamonro ʙar dine joftem va mo az pai onho meravem»
Va on tavr pes az tu ʙa kadom dehae ʙimdihandae firistodem, mutana'imonas (sohiʙne'matonas) guftand: «Padaronamonro ʙar dine joftem va mo ʙa amalhoi onho iqtido (panravi) mekunem»
Guft: «Hatto agar ʙaroi sumo cize ʙijovaram, ki az on ci padaronatonro ʙar on jofta ʙuded, hidojatkunandatar ʙosad?» Guftand: «Mo ʙa dine, ki sumoro ʙa on firistodaand, ʙeimonem»
Pas az onho intiqom giriftem. Va ʙingar, ki oqiʙati duruƣʙarorandagon ci guna ʙudaast
Va Iʙrohim ʙa padaru qavmas guft: «Man az on ci sumo meparasted, ʙezoram
ƣajri on ki maro ofarida, ki U rohnamoijam xohad kard»
Va in suxanro dar farzandoni xud suxane pojanda kard, ʙosad, ki ʙa Xudo ʙozgardand
Va Man inhovu padaronasonro az zindagi ʙahramand kardam, to on goh ki haq va pajomʙare ravsangar ʙa sujason omad
Cun haq ʙar onho oskor sud, guftand: «In codust va mo ʙa on imon nameovarem»
Guftand: «Caro in Qur'on ʙar marde az ʙuzurgmardoni on du deha nozil nasudaast?»

Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand? Xol on ki mo ruzii onhoro dar in zindagii dunjo mijonason taqsim mekunem. Va ʙa'zero ʙa martaʙa ʙolotar az ʙa'ze digar qaror dodaem, to ʙa'ze ʙa'zi digarro ʙa xidmat girand. Va rahmati Parvardigorat az on ci onho cam' meovarand, ʙehtar ast
Va agar na on ʙud, ki hamai mardum jak ummat namesudand, saqfhoi xonahoi kasonero, ki Xudoi rahmonro ʙovar nadorand, az nuqra mekardem va ʙar onho nardʙonhoe, menihodem, to ʙar on ʙolo ravand
Va ʙaroi xonahojason niz darhoe az nuqra mekardem va taxthoe, ki ʙar onho takja zanand
va az har guna zinat. Va hamai inho ʙahramandii nocizi dunjavist, hol on ki oxirat dar nazdi Parvardigori tu ʙaroi parhezgoron ast
Har kas, ki az jodi Xudoi rahmon ruj gardonad, sajtone ʙar u oʙasta mekunem,, ki hameosa hamrohas ʙosad
Va on sajtonho ononro az rohi Xudo ʙozmegardonand, vale pindorand, ki hidojatjoftagonand
To on goh ki nazdi Mo ojad, megujad: «Ej kos, durii manu tu (misli) durii masriqu maƣriʙ ʙud. Va tu ci hamrohi ʙade ʙudi»
Cun sitam karded, on ruz pusajmoni foida nakunad va har du dar azoʙ sarik ʙosed
Ojo tu mexohi ʙa karon suxan ʙisunavoni jo kuron va onhoero, ki dar gumrohii oskor hastand, roh nison dihi
Va agar turo ʙiʙarem, az onho intiqom megirem
Jo on azoʙero, ki ʙa onho va'da dodaem, ʙa tu nison medihem, ki Mo ʙar onho tavono hastem
Pas dar on ci ʙa tu vahj sudaast, cang ʙizan, (pajravi kun), ki tu ʙar rohi rost hasti
Va Qur'on saʙaʙi ʙalandovoza gastani tu va qavmi tust va ʙa zudi ʙozxost saved
Az pajomʙaroni Mo, ki pes az tu firistodaem, ʙipurs: «Ojo ƣajri Xudoi rahmon digarero ʙaroi parastisi onho qaror doda ʙudem?»
Va alʙatta Musoro hamroh ʙo ojoti Xud ʙar Fir'avn va raisoni qavmas firistodem va guft: «Man firistodai Parvardigori cahonijonam!»
Cun ojoti Moro ʙar onon arza dost, ʙa nogoh hama az on ʙa xanda aftodand
Va har mu'cizae, ki ʙa onho nison dodem, az mu'cizai digar azimtar ʙud. On goh hamaro ʙa azoʙ giriftor kardem, ʙosad, ki ʙozgardand
Guftand: «Ej codugar, Parvardigoratro ʙo on nomhoe, ki ʙo tu vahj kardaast, ʙarom mo ʙixon, ki mo hidojatsudagonem»
Cun azoʙro az onho ʙardostem, pajmoni xudro sikastand
Fir'avn dar mijoni mardumas nido dod, ki ej qavmi man, ojo podsohii Misru in cujʙoron, ki az zeri poi man cori hastand, az oni man nestand? Ojo nameʙined
Ojo man ʙehtaram jo in mardi xori zalil, ki durust suxan guftan natavonad
Caro dasthojasro ʙa dastʙandhoi tillo najorostaand? Va caro guruhe az faristagon hamrohas najomadaand
Pas Fir'avn qavmi xudro gumroh soxt, to ʙa u ito'at kardand, ki mardume taʙah kor ʙudand
Cun Moro ʙa xasm ovardand, az onho intiqom giriftem va hamagonro ƣarq soxtem
Ononro dar sumori guzastagon va doston ʙaroi ojandagon kardem
Va cun dostoni pisari Marjam ovarda sud, qavmi tu ʙa sodmoni farjod zadand
va guftan, d: «Ojo xudojoni mo ʙehtarand jo U?» Va in suxanro faqat ʙaroi cidol ʙo tu guftaand, ki mardume xusumat kunandaand
U faqat ʙandae ʙud, ki Mo ne'matas ato kardem va mojai iʙrati ʙani- Isroilas gardonidem
Agar mexostem, ʙa coi sumo faristagone padid meovardem, to dar rui zamin conisini sumo gardand
Va ʙesuʙha u (Iso) nisonai faro rasidani qijomat ast. Dar in sak makuned va ʙa Man pajravi kuned! In ast rohi rost
Sajton sumoro az roh ʙoznagardonad, zero u dusmani oskori sumost
Va cun Iso ʙo dalelhoi ravsani xud omad, guft: «Barojaton hikmat ovardaam va omadaam, to cizhoero, ki dar on ixtilof mekuned, ʙajon kunam. Pas az Xudo ʙitarsed va ʙa man ito'at kuned
Xudoi jakto Parvardigori manu Parvardigori sumost. Uro ʙiparasted. Rohi rost in ast»
Guruhho ʙo ham ixtilof kardand. Pas voj ʙar sitamkoron az azoʙi dardovari qijomat
Ojo casm ʙa rohi cize cuz qijomatand, ki nogoh va ʙexaʙar ʙar onho ʙijojad
Dar on ruz duston, — ƣajr az parhezgoron, — dusmani jakdigarand
Ej ʙandagoni Man, dar on ruz ʙime ʙar sumo nest va sumo ƣamgin namesaved
On kason, ki ʙa ojoti Mo imon ovardaand va taslimi amri Mo sudaand
sumo va cufthojaton ʙo sodkomi ʙa ʙihist doxil saved
Qadahhoi zarrin va kuzahoro dar mijonason ʙa gardis meovarand. Dar on cost har ci nafs orzu kunad va dida az on lazzat ʙiʙarad. Va dar on co covidona xohed ʙud
In ʙihistest, ki ʙa ivazi korhoe, ki kardaed, ʙa merosas meʙared
Dar on co ʙarojaton mevahoi ʙisjor hast, ki az onho mexured
Gunahkoron dar azoʙi cahannam covidonand
Azoʙason kam namesavad va onho az noumedi xomus ʙosand
Mo ʙa onho zulme nakardaem, onho xud ʙa xudason sitam kardaand
Farjod ʙarovarand, ki ej moliki duzax kos Parvardigori tu moro ʙimironad. Megujad: «Na, sumo dar in co mondani hasted»
Mo sumoro ʙo haq osno kardem, vale ʙestaraton haqro ʙad dided
Ojo onho dar e'tiqodi xud poj fisurdaand? Mo ham poj fisurdaem
Ojo mepindorand, Mo rozu nacvo (suxanoni pinhoniasonro) namesunavem? Ore, rasuloni Mo nazdi onho hastand va menavisand
Bigu: «Agar Xudoi rahmonro farzande meʙud, man az naxustin parastandagon meʙudam
Pok ast Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va Parvardigori ars az on nisʙatho, ki ʙa U medihend
Pas ʙiguzorason, to ʙa hamon suxanoni ʙotil masƣul ʙosand va ʙa ʙozica sargarm, to on ruze, ki onhoro va'da dodaand, ʙirasad
Ust, ki ham dar osmon Xudost va ham dar zamin Xudost va hakimu donost
Bartaru ʙuzurgvortar ast on kas, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin va har ci dar mijoni onhost, az oni Ust va ilmi faro rasidani qijomat xosi Ust va ʙa U ʙozgardonida mesaved
Kasone ƣajri Uro, ki ʙa xudoi mexonand, qodir ʙa safo'ati kase nestand. Ƣajri kasone, ki az rui ilm ʙa haq sohidi doda ʙosand
Agar az onho ʙipursi, ki ci kase onhoro ofaridaast, megujand: «Olloh». Pas caro az haq ruj megardonand
Guftori pajjomʙar in ʙud: «Ej Parvardigori man, inho mardume hastand, ki imon nameovarand
Pas, az onho darguzar va ʙigu: «Salomat ʙosed!» Ore, ʙa zudi xohand donist
